parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Singular
Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To try, tempt, test. From peira; to test, i.e. Endeavor, scrutinize, entice, discipline.
To profane, pollute, violate. From bebelos; to desecrate.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Neuter of hieros; a sacred place, i.e. The entire precincts of the Temple.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: From kratos; to use strength, i.e. Seize or retain.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Accusative Masculine Singular
